stepAnswer: Wait, observe and come to an agreement with others, if necessary.
stepTitle: You are approaching a crossroads where the priority situation is not clear to you straightaway. What do you do?
choices: Wait, observe and come to an agreement with others, if necessary.
Proceed according to the rule right before left
Always proceed when driving straight ahead
answerLatex: Wait, observe and come to an agreement with others, if necessary.
